title: Ticket #4957: Shared port client creates sinfuls out of thin air if SP daemon not up
description: SharedPortEndpoint::GetMyLocalAddress() creates a Sinful out of thin air. This kind of code tends to cause us problems. It's safe for now, because the conjured Sinful can't succeed for any daemon not on the local machine anyway, but we're tagging it for later.
creator: tlmiller
